line.text: Thy glass will show thee how thy beauties wear

line.text: Thy dial how thy precious minutes waste

line.text: These vacant leaves thy mind imprint will bear

line.text: Those children nursed delivered from thy brain

line.text: To take a new acquaintance of thy mind
